net.sf.JRecord.Details

Class XmlLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.Details.BaseLine
      • net.sf.JRecord.Details.ListLine
        • net.sf.JRecord.Details.XmlLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractIndexedLine, ILineFieldNames, AbstractLine

    public class XmlLine
extends ListLine
    Line for use with XML files.

    The one important method is getFieldValue

    Creating: 

                  AbstractLine outLine = new XmlLine(oLayout, recordIdx);

    Getting a field value: 

                  long sku = saleRecord.getFieldValue("KEYCODE-NO").asLong();

    Updating a field: 

                  saleRecord.getFieldValue("KEYCODE-NO").set(1331);
    Author:
    Bruce Martin
